data.title: Translation
data.meta_description: This page includes resources that address the translation documents or content for LEP individuals.
data.text:
Language Identification Card (PDF) (archive link), created by the State of Ohio Office of Criminal Justice Services, the National Association of Judiciary Interpreters and Translators, the Summit County Sheriff's Office, and the American Translators Association

I Speak Statements Card (PDF), U.S. Department of Agriculture, Food and Nutrition Service

Indigenous Language Identification Sticker, U.S. Department of Homeland Security

Language Identification Flashcard (PDF), U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census

Language Access Cards in 27 Languages, City of Philadelphia, 2019

I Speak Language Identification Cards (PDF), Indiana Supreme Court, 2019

Language Identification Card, Nassau County, New York, Police Department, 2017

Language Identification Card (PDF), Virginia Department of Health, 2011

I Speak Cards (bottom of page), Available in 21 Languages, City of Roanoke, Virginia

I Speak Cards, Available in 16 Languages, California Department of Social Services,

I Speak Cards, Available in 17 Languages, Connecticut Department of Public Health

I Speak Card, Available in 17 Languages, Scott County Health Department

Language Identification Card (PDF), New Jersey Hospital Association

Language Identification Card (PDF), City of Houston, Texas

iSpeak Austin, Language Identification Cards, Videos, and Resources, City of Austin, Texas

I Speak Language Cards, Available in 42 Languages, King County, Washington State

I Speak Language Cards, Available in 14 Languages, State of Hawaii, Office of Language Access
